description:
*TestBase* gets you off to a flying start when unit testing projects with dependencies.

It includes a rich extensible set of fluent assertions and a set of verifiable Fake Ado.Net components, with easy setup and verification.

TestBase.Shoulds
------------------
* fluent assertions including ShouldBe, ShouldMatch, ShouldNotBe, ShouldContain, ShouldNotContain, ShouldBeEmpty, ShouldNotBeEmpty, ShouldAll and many more
* ShouldEqualByValue works with all kinds of object and collections
* Stream assertions include ShouldContain and ShouldEqualByValue

TestBase.FakeDb
------------------
* fakeDbConnection.SetupForQuery(fakeData, new[] {"FieldName1", FieldName2"})
* fakeDbConnection.SetupForExecuteNonQuery(rowsAffected)
* fakeDbConnection.Verify(x=>x.CommandText.Matches("Insert [case] .*") && x.Parameters["id"].Value==1)
releaseNotes: Version 1. Unpolished but in use for over a year
summary:
*TestBase* - a flying start for unit testing with a rich set of easy fluent assertions and easy-to-setup & verify fake Ado.Net components. 
Shoulds for IEnumerables, Streams, string & patterns, including ShouldEqualByValue()
FakeDbConnection : SetupForQuery(), SetupForExecuteNonQuery(), Verify(), ...
title: TestBase
